item.title: 18 Amazing Celery Benefits And Side Effects
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Celery is an herbaceous plant of the parsley family ( Apiaceae) and its stalks and leaves are used to flavor soups and stocks. It is low in calories, has high water content, and is used as a low-carb snack option. Celery is native to Mediterranean and North African areas but is now cultivated globally. item.title: Why is delta 8 Gaining So Much Popularity Among Health Freaks?
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Delta-8 THC is a cannabinoid. It is extracted from plants due to its small quantities and processed in laboratories, where it is treated carefully and concentrated. Delta-8-THC, Delta-9’s relatively mild twin, is now legalized. It does not only alleviate pain but also increases appetite and helps with anxiety and nausea.
